author: Marie J. French and Sam Sutton
title: New York region governors plan coordinated economic restart
description: Amid signs the spread of the virus may be nearing its peak in the region, states are grappling with the question of how to resume normal activities.
content:
Connecticut Gov. Ned Lamont, left, speaks as New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo listens during a press conference | AP Photo
ALBANY, N.Y. The governors of New York, New Jersey and Connecticut will take a regional approach to reopening the economy when it is safe to … [+5218 chars]
